Subject: Install Switches for Client Version 6.2.2.2005
Description: I was corresponding with Flaviu Moldovan in Ticket #00414808, but would like to continue on this new ticket because Ticket #00414808 was opened by my colleague (who is OOO). I am trying to install the newest client (version 6.2.2.2005) and would like to use the following switches: NO ADDINS: EPPClientSetup.6.2.2.2005_x86_64_[a=10.10.3.248,d=FIRMDefault,o=0,n=0].msi OUTLOOK ADDIN: EPPClientSetup_SSB.6.2.2.2005_x86_64_[a=10.10.3.248,d=FIRMDefault,n=0].msi I downloaded EPPClient_v6.2.2.2005.zip and unzipped the file. I see EPPClientSetup_x86_64.msi, which is what I want to use for x64 endpoints. However, I cannot use the a, d, o, and n switches when I try to install EPPClientSetup_x86_64.msi. I also tried changing the name of the msi file to EPPClientSetup.6.2.2.2005_x86_64, but I could not install the client software. Can you please advise how I can specify the EPP server, default policy, and add-ons using the msi file for version 6.2.2.2005? Regards, Paul Goyette
